title: Outside Looking Out: The razor sharp sequel to 'Basically Frightened'
description: “I cannot recommend this book enough. Absolutely first rate work and I look forward to reading more from this author.” Amanda“A riveting read, intensified by the first person point of view and the vivid descriptions of the scenes and characters, ” AdityaThe world is still recovering from 'The Shakes' and new factions are forming. Our hero, left adrift from the friends he had made in 'Basically Frightened', has to use his notable wit and sly self-invention to get through a new cast of people intending to use him or dispose of him.Once again, not all is what it seems and a new group starts to exert its influence. 'Protected Infected', self-appointed champions of the victims, have determined that society has to change. 'Order' have their own agenda. Meanwhile, the most unlikely of protectors has to survive in a very different collective. It's not all planting potatoes!
author: Vasily Pugh
